img.alt: The EJ School Staff presents...'Footloose' for all of our students who we miss very much! Featured Photo

h3.a: The EJ School Staff presents...'Footloose' for all of our students who we miss very much!

article.div: (A special thank you to Mrs. Esarey for organizing.)

h3.a: LBI BOE Meeting (4-28-20): NOTICE OF CHANGE OF TIME AND MEETING LOCATION

article.div:
The Long Beach Island Board of Education, in the County of Ocean, hereby amends its annual meeting notice and announces that the meeting scheduled for Tuesday, April 28, 2020 at 7:00 pm will now be held at 6:00 p.m. as a remote/virtual meeting in accordance with the Open Public Meetings Act, N.J.S.A. 10:4-6 et seq., as amended by P.L.2020, c.11. The meeting will include a public hearing on the school budget for the 2020-2021 school year. Members of the public who wish to attend the remote/virtual meeting and participate in public comment may do so by accessing the district website and following the guidance provided at www.lbischools.org at 6:00 pm on April 28, 2020. All public comments that are received prior to the conclusion of the public comment portion of the meeting will be included in the record. Formal action will be taken.
Chris KellySchool Business Administrator/Board Secretary
Please click to Read Full Story.

img.alt: Click here to view kindergarten registration information. Featured Photo

h3.a: Click here to view kindergarten registration information.

article.div: To be eligible for registration, your child must be 5 years old on or before October 1, 2020.

h2.a: Long Beach Island Consolidated School District

div.div: Thank you for visiting our website! Please check back often as updates are made, and click on article headlines to view full stories where applicable.

img.alt: Long Beach Island Consolidated School District Image

div.div: The Long Beach Island Consolidated School District, in partnership with our unique island community, provides, preserves and develops an exceptional and diverse educational experience for the students. This creates a foundation that instills a life long love of learning, seeding the future of their community.
Location: Long Beach Island Grade School
Location: Long Beach Island Grade School, 201 20th Street, Ship Bottom
Location: Long Beach Island Grade School, 201 20th Street, Ship Bottom

div.span: 200 South Barnegat Avenue, Surf City, New Jersey 08008
